items.title: Tribe conjures magic for first time during streak
items.summary: For the first time in their 22-game win streak, the Indians couldn't win by just pitching and hitting better than their opponent. They needed some magic.
items.content: For the first time in their 22-game win streak, the Indians couldn't win by just pitching and hitting better than their opponent. They needed some magic.

alternate.title: Tribe conjures magic for first time during streak

items.title: Too, too cool! Tribe streak best in 100 years
items.summary: The Indians did not set a new record with consecutive win No. 22. And that's just fine, because they've already done something arguably more impressive. Because it is occurring in a more modern, more dynamic time and has been more statistically dominant than any lossless run before it, The Streak is not baseball's longest but its best.
items.content: The Indians did not set a new record with consecutive win No. 22. And that's just fine, because they've already done something arguably more impressive. Because it is occurring in a more modern, more dynamic time and has been more statistically dominant than any lossless run before it, The Streak is not baseball's longest but its best.

alternate.title: Too, too cool! Tribe streak best in 100 years

items.title: Lindor blossoming into leader during streak
items.summary: Francisco Lindor has already become a star, but during the Indians' record-setting winning streak, he's blossomed into a leader behind the scenes.
items.content: Francisco Lindor has already become a star, but during the Indians' record-setting winning streak, he's blossomed into a leader behind the scenes.

alternate.title: Lindor blossoming into leader during streak

items.title: King Felix looks sharp in return from DL
items.summary: The King was back on the hill Thursday night, and for the Mariners, that was a very welcome sight indeed.
items.content: The King was back on the hill Thursday night, and for the Mariners, that was a very welcome sight indeed.

alternate.title: King Felix looks sharp in return from DL

items.title: Gordon extends career-high hit streak to 17
items.summary: There's been little for Marlins fans to cheer about during the past two-plus weeks, as their once Wild Card-hopeful club has dropped 15 of 17, punctuated by getting swept by the Phillies on Thursday.
items.content: There's been little for Marlins fans to cheer about during the past two-plus weeks, as their once Wild Card-hopeful club has dropped 15 of 17, punctuated by getting swept by the Phillies on Thursday.

alternate.title: Gordon extends career-high hit streak to 17

items.title: Hustling J-Ram keeps foot on gas all game
items.summary: When Indians second baseman Jose Ramirez took off for second with one out in the top of the sixth inning of Thursday's game against the Royals, it appeared almost certain the he had the base stolen.
items.content: When Indians second baseman Jose Ramirez took off for second with one out in the top of the sixth inning of Thursday's game against the Royals, it appeared almost certain the he had the base stolen.

alternate.title: Hustling J-Ram keeps foot on gas all game

items.title: Rangers realize urgency as they embark on trip
items.summary: The course of a team's season ebbs and flows over the six months it takes to make it to the finish line. Whichever one of those words means "performing poorly" is the one that describes the Rangers at the moment.
items.content: The course of a team's season ebbs and flows over the six months it takes to make it to the finish line. Whichever one of those words means "performing poorly" is the one that describes the Rangers at the moment.

alternate.title: Rangers realize urgency as they embark on trip
